===== Requires DXCore 11.1 =====
=== Introduction ===
Provides a !CodeProvider to implement IDisposable, including the disposal of any disposable fields.

=== Usage ===
Place the caret on the source of a class which does not implement IDisposable, but which has fields which do.

The "Implement IDisposable" !CodeProvider will become available from the Code !SmartTagMenu

Select this item and the plugin will implement IDisposable including the disposal of each of the fields (on the condition that they are not null)
